sub_fields.label: Hide on Mobile
sub_fields.name: hom
sub_fields.instructions: At 768px wide, the background image will be gone. The helps the problem of a background focused image on one side, colliding with text on the other side. Try using a background color for mobile if you're using white text.

choices.dynamic: Use Existing Content ( posts, testimonials, etc )

sub_fields.label: Background Video
sub_fields.name: video
sub_fields.instructions: Does your slide include a background video?

sub_fields.label: Transition Speed
sub_fields.name: tran_speed
sub_fields.instructions: The transition speed is how long the slide takes to move from one slide to the next.

sub_fields.label: Pause Speed
sub_fields.name: pause_speed
sub_fields.instructions: The Pause speed is how long the slider pauses in between slides

sub_fields.label: Auto Start
sub_fields.name: a_start
sub_fields.instructions: Do you want this to automatically go from slide to slide, or do you only want the user to be able to control the slide? Its recommended that this not be used for content that needs to be read.

sub_fields.label: Looping
sub_fields.name: looping
sub_fields.instructions: When the last slide is reached, do you want it to start over again?

fields.label: Social Network
fields.name: social_network
fields.instructions: We're using ss-social for the icons here - https://github.com/simmo/symbolset/blob/master/_symbolset.scss
